title: firo-c42001-08
text: APPROVAL FORM FOR GRADUATE STUDENTS TO PARTICIPATE EXCHANGE PROGRAMS Application for ……..…term/ ….…/…….. Academic Year I herewith confirm that I informed and had the approval from my thesis advisor for exchange program application. _________________________________ (Student’s name-surname, signature) _________________________________ (Date, place) ______________________________________ (Advisor’s Name-surname, signature) International Relations Office
